text: Na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 43. I will not speak with the mouth full of food: a training to be observed.
๔๓. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “ปากยังมีคำข้าวเราจักไม่พูด”
43. I shall not speak with the mouth full: this is a training to be done.
